definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be able (Dn) (Targum; Nab. (rare) SAC:60; Eg. Aram. S-C:E 8, 11+; Chr-Pal. Schulth:83; BH [[יָכׂל]]);—

definitions.title: Pe. 1.
definitions.body: c. Inf. be able to do:Pf. 3 ms. [[יְכִל]] Da 6:21 (subj. God), 2 ms. [[יְכֵ֫לְתָּ]] Da 2:47; Impf. 3 ms. [[יוּכַל]] (Hebraism, K:§ 43, 1. Beisp. b)) v:Da 2:10, [[יִכֻּל]] Da 3:29 (subj. a god), 2 ms. [[תוכל]] Da 5:16, Da 5:16 (<both Qr [[תִּכּוּל]], K:1. c.); Pt. [[יָכִל]] Da 3:17, Da 4:34 (both subj. God); pl. [[יָֽכְּ לִין]] Da 2:27, Da 4:15, Da 6:5.
